amendment.description: At the end of division A (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available in division A, except those amounts made available to the Department of Defense, is hereby reduced by 14 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease amounts made available in Division A, other than amounts made available to the Department of Defense, by 14 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 296 (Roll no. 371).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Banks.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 296 (Roll no. 371).
